subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Ernie Els and Ángel Cabrera will meet today in the HSBC World Match Play final in Virginia Water, England. Els moved a step closer to the title when he overcame Henrik Stenson, 3 and 2, at Wentworth. Cabrera never trailed in his 2-and-1 victory over Hunter Mahan.
